main event: A civilian reported observing an unusual aerial object in Utica, New York on January 5, 1966, which hovered for a few minutes before accelerating away at high speed.
interesting points: The object was first seen hovering motionless at a high angle in the northeast direction,The object appeared to be the size of a full moon and exhibited a pulsing illumination,Witnesses stated that the acceleration of the object was beyond the capability of known aircraft,There were multiple reports of sightings in the area around the same time,The letter from Project Blue Book requested additional information and emphasized the lack of reports from New York for the specified date.
sighted object: an unusual aerial object exhibiting intermittent illumination
witness description: a married couple observing from their home
